title: Magna Carta - Seasons [1970] Folk/Rock
description:
Magna Carta - Seasons [1970] Folk/Rock

Musicians:
Chris Simpson: Guitar [steel-strung Martin D18], Vocals.
Lyell Tranter: Guitar [nylon-strung Gibson].
Glen Stuart: Vocals [Harmonies and Spoken Words].

Others:
Drums: Barry Morgan, Tony Carr.
Fender Bass: Tony Visconti.
String Bass: Spike Heatley.
Organ & Piano: Rick Wakeman.
Recorders: Tony Visconti & Tim Renwick.
Electric Guitar & Sitar: Davy Johnstone (Shaggis).
Solo Cello: Peter Willison.
Flute: Derek Grossmith.

Side 1
[01] Prologue
[02] Winter Song
[03] Spring Poem
[04] Spring Song
[05] Summer Poem
[06] Summer Song
[07] Autumn Song
[08] Epilogue
[09] Winter Song [Reprise]

Arranged and Conducted by: Tony Visconti.
Recorded at: Trident Studios, London.
Engineer: Robin Geoffrey Cable.
